meanings.definition: A large, impressive residence or building, especially one that is the official residence of a king, queen, or other high-ranking person.
meanings.sent1: The grand palaces in the city were adorned with gold and marble.
meanings.sent2: The royal family lived in the magnificent palaces overlooking the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The palace was so big that the king got lost in his own home!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was a palace of warmth in a cold world.
meanings.sent5: The palaces stood tall like giants in the land, commanding respect from all.

meanings.definition: The official residence of a king, queen, or other high-ranking person.
meanings.sent1: The ancient palace was where the king held court and made important decisions.
meanings.sent2: Visitors were welcomed with open arms at the royal palace.
meanings.sent3: The palace guards had a secret dance party when the royals were away.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a palace of joy that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The palace gleamed in the sunlight, a symbol of power and authority.
